ContentType.name: ApprovalWorkflow
ContentType.Description: Approval workflow can be used to launch an approval process on a list item. If you assign this workflow to a content list, users will be able to start the approval process on the Start workflow page of list items. During the assign process you will have to set the approver users and approve time frame for that content list.

Field.name: RelatedContent
Field.Description: The content that the approvers have to approve

Field.name: FirstLevelApprover
Field.Description: The user who need to approve the selected content

Field.name: FirstLevelTimeFrame
Field.Description: Time frame that first level approver has for approving the content (timespan format: '[d.]hh:mm:ss')

Field.name: SecondLevelApprover
Field.Description: Users who can approve the selected content if first level approvers did not approve it in the given time frame

Field.name: SecondLevelTimeFrame
Field.Description: Time frame that second level approvers have for approving the content (timespan format: '[d.]hh:mm:ss')

Field.name: WaitForAll
Field.Description: If this option is set to true, all second level approvers should approve the content. If false, one of the is enough.
